ygData.subject: Re: War and Peace
ygData.msgSnippet: A missile hits Drag Strip, sending him flying away from all the other melee fire, and he is sent straight towards Firearm thanks to the momentum. As Wildrider

Subject: Re: War and Peace
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

A missile hits Drag Strip, sending him flying away from all the other melee
fire, and he is sent straight towards Firearm thanks to the momentum.

As Wildrider drives towards Firearm, the shots start exploding around him,
"holy cow" he screams, as a missile rearends him, and he is sent hurtling
upwards. Instead of landing however he continues his movement towards
Firearm, this time from the air though, giving him the momentum of gravity.
